text: @BBCNews @coronavirus. Exercise.  Eyes shut eyes open eyes shut eyes open as you lay in the park. Not so funny people. Keep eyes open and look around. We have to beat this.Some are still not getting it. Just because the sun shines doesn't mean the rules change.
